message: Bob, I have a unique product I think you'll be very interested in. It's valued at no less than $15000 to me, but I'm willing to offer it to you for $20000.  Let me know your thoughts.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $20000 is above my budget. I'm interested in this product, but I can only go up to $12000. Let me know what you think.

Bob, I understand your position, but $12000 is significantly below what I'm willing to accept.  I'm willing to come down to $17000 to make this work. This represents a good compromise for both of us.  Let me know if you're interested.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but $17000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $14000, which is the absolute maximum I can afford.  If you're not willing to accept this price, I'll have to go with another seller.
